solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int minPathSum(int[][] grid) {--newline--        int m = grid.length;// row--newline--        int n = grid[0].length; // column--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {--newline--            for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {--newline--                if (i == 0 && j != 0) {--newline--                    grid[i][j] = grid[i][j] + grid[i][j - 1];--newline--                } else if (i != 0 && j == 0) {--newline--                    grid[i][j] = grid[i][j] + grid[i - 1][j];--newline--                } else if (i == 0 && j == 0) {--newline--                    grid[i][j] = grid[i][j];--newline--                } else {--newline--                    grid[i][j] = Math.min(grid[i][j - 1], grid[i - 1][j])--newline--                            + grid[i][j];--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--        return grid[m - 1][n - 1];--newline--    }--newline--}
